GROUND_REACTIONS.DOCUMENTATION: The hydrodynamic interactions of the floats are modelled by external forces.

FUNCTION.NAME: aero/function/qbar-propwash-psf
FUNCTION.DESCRIPTION: q bar due to the propeller induced velocity

FUNCTION.NAME: aero/function/velocity-induced-fps
FUNCTION.DESCRIPTION: velocity including the propulsion induced velocity.

FUNCTION.NAME: aero/function/qbar-induced-psf
FUNCTION.DESCRIPTION: q bar including the propulsion induced velocity.
